Reference

Basic Functions

Functions that are basic.

contract()

Create a financial contract

schedule()

Create the events of a contract

Adding terms

Functions for adding terms

term_end()

Set the end details of a contract

term_series()

Create a series of payments or reciepts

term_start()

Set the start details of a contract

Helper functions

make_date_seq()

Create a sequence of dates

Creating custom clauses

These fuctions can be used if you want to add new types of clauses or terms.

make_term()

Make a new term object

add_term()

Add a new term to a contract

stipulate()

Add a stipulation to a contract
